```{r}
library(caret)
library(nnet)
library(NeuralNetTools)
```

```{r}
index = sample( seq_len ( nrow ( scaled) ), size = samplesize ) 
train = scaled[index , ] 
test = testdataSection
scaled_test <- scaled_testdataSection
```

```{r}
model.nn <- train(Actual_Time ~ Age + Section_NN + Sex_NN,
                  data = train,
                  method = "nnet")
print(model.nn)
```


```{r}
predictions <- predict(model.nn, test[,1:14])
accuracy <- sum(predictions == test[,15])/length(test[,15])
print(accuracy)
```
